Class Normalizer

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Logging, Identifiable, HasInputCol, HasOutputCol, Params

    public class Normalizer
extends UnaryTransformer<Vector,Vector,Normalizer>
    :: AlphaComponent :: Normalize a vector to have unit norm using the given p-norm.
